[Rundi]: Bititawe kuri ivyo, Ababirigi bose bavuga igifaransa n'aba Swisi baba barize igifaransa gisanzwe mw'ishure, rero baba boshobora kugutahura n'aho wokoresha sisiteme yo guharura y'Abafaransa isanzwe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Rundi]: Mu binjana vyinshi, abantu baratavye ibibanza bitonze muri iyo misozi igoye, ihanamye neza na neza imbere y'ibimanga birabana n'ikiyaga.

[Rundi]: Miles 800 za sisiteme y´umuringoti w´igitoro ujabuka Alaska zarugawe bitewe n´iseseka ry´ingunguru ibihumbi z'igitoro kitamininye mu bumanuko bwa Fairbanks, i Alaska.

[Rundi]: Hari ibice vy'Ububiligi vyahora vyegukira Luxembourg. Vyegukiye Ububiligi inyuma y'Imigumuko yo mu Bubiligi yabaye mu 1830.

[Rundi]: Kuva catangura, ikinyamakuru “The onion” cabaye ikinyamakuru ca mbere gitanga amakuru harimwo ugutwenza. Iki kinyamakuru kirafise igice gisohora ku mpapuro kandi kiri no kungurukanya bumenyi aho cazanye abantu 5 000 000 mu kwezi kw’icumi. Kiramenyekanisha abantu, gikora amasaha 24 kuri 24, kandi kirakora n’ibiganiro vy’amajwi hamwe n’amakuru y’isi yitwa atlas bise “isi yacu y’ikijuju”.

[Rundi]: Bititawe kuri ivyo, Ababirigi bose bavuga igifaransa n'aba Swisi baba barize igifaransa gisanzwe mw'ishure, rero baba boshobora kugutahura n'aho wokoresha sisiteme yo guharura y'Abafaransa isanzwe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Rundi]: Mu binjana vyinshi, abantu baratavye ibibanza bitonze muri iyo misozi igoye, ihanamye neza na neza imbere y'ibimanga birabana n'ikiyaga.

[Rundi]: Miles 800 za sisiteme y´umuringoti w´igitoro ujabuka Alaska zarugawe bitewe n´iseseka ry´ingunguru ibihumbi z'igitoro kitamininye mu bumanuko bwa Fairbanks, i Alaska.

[Rundi]: Hari ibice vy'Ububiligi vyahora vyegukira Luxembourg. Vyegukiye Ububiligi inyuma y'Imigumuko yo mu Bubiligi yabaye mu 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Rundi]: Bititawe kuri ivyo, Ababirigi bose bavuga igifaransa n'aba Swisi baba barize igifaransa gisanzwe mw'ishure, rero baba boshobora kugutahura n'aho wokoresha sisiteme yo guharura y'Abafaransa isanzwe.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Rundi]: Mu binjana vyinshi, abantu baratavye ibibanza bitonze muri iyo misozi igoye, ihanamye neza na neza imbere y'ibimanga birabana n'ikiyaga.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Rundi]: Miles 800 za sisiteme y´umuringoti w´igitoro ujabuka Alaska zarugawe bitewe n´iseseka ry´ingunguru ibihumbi z'igitoro kitamininye mu bumanuko bwa Fairbanks, i Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Rundi]: Hari ibice vy'Ububiligi vyahora vyegukira Luxembourg. Vyegukiye Ububiligi inyuma y'Imigumuko yo mu Bubiligi yabaye mu 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Rundi]: Kuva catangura, ikinyamakuru “The onion” cabaye ikinyamakuru ca mbere gitanga amakuru harimwo ugutwenza. Iki kinyamakuru kirafise igice gisohora ku mpapuro kandi kiri no kungurukanya bumenyi aho cazanye abantu 5 000 000 mu kwezi kw’icumi. Kiramenyekanisha abantu, gikora amasaha 24 kuri 24, kandi kirakora n’ibiganiro vy’amajwi hamwe n’amakuru y’isi yitwa atlas bise “isi yacu y’ikijuju”.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Aba Guaraní ni numugwi w' abasangwa butaka ubu ari Paraguay y' ubuseruko, babaho nk' abahigi bameze nk' abatagira uburagamo bakora uburimyi bw' ivyo kurya.
